text: Timnufaq ad aôount krav tardiwin. Ur asent iêell ara ad ffrent ayen Ixleq Öebbi, di tâabbav nnsent, ma umnent s Öebbi akked wass aneggaru. Ma b$an irgazen nnsent ad mûalaêen, izzewr iten lêal a tent id rren, di lmudda nni. Akken pwalasent ay ppalasent, s lqanun. I yirgazen, asurif $er loiha nnsent. Öebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
